title: Applicant name on the will
question: Is your name ‘{applicantName}’ exactly what appears on the will?
questionWithoutName: Is your name exactly what appears on the will?
questionWithCodicil: Is your name ‘{applicantName}’ exactly what appears on the will or codicil?

nameAsOnTheWill.required: Answer ‘yes’ if your name is exactly the same on the will or codicil
